name: vstack-typescript-generator
description: Tool to generate TypeScript interfaces and TypeScript filter classes for Vstack from C# sources.

scripts.patch-release: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.build: yarn run clean & yarn run build:typescript
scripts.test: yarn run test:spec && yarn run test:generate && yarn run test:compare
scripts.test:generate: node dist/src/tsgen-cli.js test-project/tsgen-outdir.json && node dist/src/tsgen-cli.js test-project/tsgen-outfile.json
scripts.remap-coverage: yarn run remap-coverage-json & yarn run remap-coverage-html

author: Vintage Software
